Hoboken.Maritime Hotel:
The Maritime Hotel is a luxury boutique hotel located at 363 West 16th Street at Ninth Avenue in the Chelsea neighborhood of Manhattan, New York City, close to the Meatpacking District. It has 120 rooms and 4 suites, all decorated in a nautical theme, in line with the building's maritime history, and the porthole-inspired facade.


== Building ==
New Orleans-based architect Albert C. Ledner designed three buildings for the National Maritime Union of America in the 1960s, all white buildings that prominently featured portholes as an architectural feature.
